* BrightBlade received Gangon's coordinates and smiled, she was soon to 
become a loyal follower of the tyrant Hell Beast!
She looked back in the direction that she had seen Megatron go off in but 
turned and headed in the direction of the Predacon base.
It wasn't long until she came to it and saw some action, a huge black beast 
had just slammed it's head into an antbot. She smiled.
BrightBlade looked around for Gangon, perhaps he could fill her in?*
